extendedInfo.description: Bar Karma: the first community-developed television series ever... Nowâs your chance to make better television from the ground up, as part of the worldâs first community developed sci-fi series. Help tell the story of a mysterious bar that moves through time and space, by contributing story ideas and images right from your Android smart phone!The Story So Farâ¦When one door closes, another one opens. And when that door opens into the most mysterious bar in the universe, strange things begin to happen. Bar Karma, a mystical watering hole that travels through time and space, pops into its patrons' lives when they need more than a stiff drink.Every happy hour, the Bar Karma staff guides one lost soul through a crossroads in his or her life, using eerie glimpses into the past, present and many possible futures. Some think it's destiny, others believe free will brought them to the bar. But none of them will pass through the Bar Karma doors without being changed forever.

reviews.comment: We give ideas and then vote on everybodys ideas. We drive the story, so if it isn\'t good it\'s the communitys fault. Great idea. Will Wright genius.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love the show... love the application. Please enable App2SD in a future update and the ability to shut off video/picture syncing with media library.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good app, but we\'re not using iPhones.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: They want us to give them ideas for a show? How dumb
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Was under the impression this app would let me watch the show, not just a bunch of clips. Don\'t have CurrentTV available.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: How lazy can you be.. change the app description. This is the android market..
